scenes.description: The video opens with a black screen, serving as an intro or transition.
A person signs a document at a registration desk, flanked by Korean and Russian flags, indicating an international event.
Attendees check in at the event, scanning QR codes and undergoing temperature checks, highlighting health protocols.
A wide shot of event signage, 'Korea-Russia Innovation Platform 2021 STARTUP SUMMIT,' with attendees walking by, setting the scene.
Event staff wearing masks operate technical equipment at a control station, showing behind-the-scenes preparation.
A tilt-up shot of two professional video cameras on tripods, ready to record the event.
A masked photographer captures moments at the event, with other masked attendees visible in the background.
Masked attendees are focused on their laptops at a table, showing engagement during the event.
An establishing wide shot of the event stage with the 'STARTUP SUMMIT' title prominently displayed on a large screen.
A female host, wearing a white jacket, speaks into a microphone at the podium, initiating the event.
A close-up of a control room monitor displaying various live camera feeds from the event, including the host.
A wide shot of the stage shows the host and another person, with the main screen displaying a split view of the ongoing presentation.
A medium close-up of a masked male speaker at the podium, with his image mirrored on the large screen behind him.
A wide shot captures the entire event hall, showcasing the stage with speakers on screen and the masked audience seated at tables.
A medium close-up of a masked male speaker at the podium, with his image mirrored on the large screen behind him.
Another medium close-up of a masked male speaker at the podium, with his image mirrored on the large screen.
Two masked attendees at a table attentively watch the stage, showing audience engagement.
A close-up of a festive Christmas tree decoration with 'KR-TECHCONNECT 3rd' on it, adding a seasonal touch.
A wide shot of the event hall, showing a female speaker on the large screen, indicating a virtual presentation.
A masked man in a suit is shown in a medium close-up, attentively observing the event.
A man speaks remotely via video call, his presentation displayed on the large screen for the audience.
Two men on stage participate in an 'NDA Signing Ceremony,' their actions shown on the large screen.
A close-up shows a man digitally signing a document on a tablet, highlighting the modern signing process.
Two masked men stand on stage, with the female host speaking on the large screen behind them, introducing the next segment.
Five masked individuals stand on stage for a group photo, marking a collaborative moment.
Jeong Tae Yun is introduced on stage, with 'MYO MIRROR Smart Healthcare for everyone' displayed, indicating a startup presentation.
Jeong Tae Yun presents at the podium, with his presentation slides visible on the large screen behind him.
A masked audience member asks a question into a microphone, showing interactive engagement.
A wide shot of the event hall captures a speaker on stage and an audience member asking a question, showing the interactive session.
A masked speaker on stage holds a microphone and gestures, delivering his presentation.
The female host speaks into a microphone, being recorded by a camera on a tripod, with an audience member in the foreground.
A masked audience member speaks into a microphone at a table, participating in the Q&A.
A masked speaker on stage holds a microphone and gestures, continuing his presentation.
A speaker at the podium presents, with his slides displayed on the large screen.
Another medium shot of a speaker at the podium, presenting with slides on the large screen.
A speaker at the podium presents, with his slides displayed on the large screen.
A speaker at the podium presents, with his slides displayed on the large screen.
A man in a suit is interviewed in front of the event banner, being recorded by a camera.
A man in a suit is interviewed in front of the event banner, being recorded by a camera.
A man in a suit speaks at a podium, with the event banner visible behind him.
Masked attendees at a table clap, showing appreciation for a presentation or announcement.
Five masked men on stage raise their fists in a gesture of success or solidarity, concluding a segment.
The video concludes with the event title card 'Korea-Russia Innovation Platform 2021 STARTUP SUMMIT'.

recurring_sequences: Establishing Wide Shot (venue/stage) → Speaker (Medium Shot/Medium Close-up) → Audience reaction (Medium Shot/Medium Close-up)
Interspersed B-roll shots (tech setup, interviews) to provide context and break presentation flow.
editing_patterns.dominant_camera_style: Static shots with occasional subtle camera movements (e.g., tilt).

narrative_structure: The video follows a chronological narrative: event setup and registration, followed by various presentations (both live and virtual), key signing ceremonies (NDA, MOU), interactive Q&A sessions with the audience, and concluding with group photos and final branding.
summary: The video employs a professional, documentary-style editing approach to capture the 'Korea-Russia Innovation Platform 2021 Startup Summit.' The pacing is generally steady, with most cuts lasting around 3-4 seconds, creating a consistent flow. The camera work primarily relies on static shots, focusing on speakers, audience reactions, and event details. Interspersed B-roll shots of technical equipment and event branding help establish context and break the monotony of presentations. The narrative progresses from event setup and registration, through various presentations and signing ceremonies, to a concluding group photo, effectively showcasing the event's key activities and participants. The overall tone is informative and collaborative, highlighting the international partnership and innovation.

_metadata.video_title: 한러혁신플랫폼 스타트업 서밋 SUMMIT 행사 스케치 영상
